value.desc: Model of the component defining the split ratio percent (0.0 < x < 100.0) between panels; Either use this property (along with a listener for 'input' event) OR use v-model directive

reverse.desc: Apply the model size to the second panel (by default it applies to the first)

emit-immediately.desc: Emit model while user is panning on the separator

horizontal.desc: Allows the splitter to split its two panels horizontally, instead of vertically

limits.desc: An array of two values representing the minimum and maximum split size of the two panels; When 'px' unit is set then you can use Infinity as the second value to make it unbound on the other side

before-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'before' panel

after-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the 'after' panel

separator-class.desc: Class definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

separator-style.desc: Style definitions to be attributed to the splitter separator

dark.desc: Applies a default lighter color on the separator; To be used when background is darker; Avoid using when you are overriding through separator-class or separator-style props

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component; Suggestion: QTooltip, QMenu

before.desc: Content of the panel on left/top

after.desc: Content of the panel on right/bottom

separator.desc: Content to be placed inside the separator; By default it is centered

input.desc: Emitted when component's model value changes; Is also used by v-model

value.desc: New model value (0.0 < x < 100.0) defining the ratio between panels
